front.title: MPLS LSP PW status refresh reduction for Static Pseudowires

abstract.t: This document describes a method includes generating an aggregated pseudowire status message on Multi-Protocol Label Switching (MPLS) network Label Switched Path (LSP). The method for transmitting the pseudowire (PW) status information is not new, however these protocol extension allows a Service Provider (SP) to reliably use the PW static status messages on individual PWs. The aggregated pseudowire status message configured to verify a current status of all pseudowires on the LSP.
